FUNC.NAME: upcEanLinearDecode
FUNC.PATH: Barcode Scanner\Decoder and Parameter Tags\Upc Ean
FUNC.SYNOPSIS: is used to enable the linear decode property.

PARAM.NAME: upcEanLinearDecode
PARAM.DESC: Sets the linear decode property to 'true' or 'false'.

EXAMPLE.DESC: The following example switches on the upcEanLinearDecode property:
EXAMPLE.CODE: <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner" Content="allDecoders:enabled"> <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner" Content="upcEanLinearDecode:true"> <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner" Content="enabled">

EXAMPLE.DESC: Above example can also be written as shown below:

EXAMPLE.CODE: <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner-all_decoders" Content="enabled"> <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner-upcEanLinearDecode" Content="true"> <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner-enabled" Content="SCN1">

ADDITIONAL.PLATFORM: All supported devices except: Android devices.
ADDITIONAL.APPLIES: Transient - Decoder settings are only guaranteed to persist until the Scanner is disabled
ADDITIONAL.REQ: Scanner or Imager module and device that supports the upcEanLinearDecode property.
